name: task_trials

column_names_to_descriptions.quiescent_start_time: Start of period in which the subject should not lick, otherwise the trial will be aborted and start over; currently just the last quiescent period which was not violated; not tracking quiescent violations
column_names_to_descriptions.quiescent_stop_time: End of period in which the subject should not lick, otherwise the trial will be aborted and start over.
column_names_to_descriptions.stim_start_time: Onset of visual or auditory stimulus.
column_names_to_descriptions.response_window_start_time: Start of window in which the subject should lick if a GO trial, otherwise should not lick.
column_names_to_descriptions.stim_stop_time: Offset of visual or auditory stimulus.
column_names_to_descriptions.response_time: Time of first lick in the response window, or NaN if no lick occurred.
column_names_to_descriptions.response_window_stop_time: End of window in which the subject should lick if a GO trial, otherwise should not lick.
column_names_to_descriptions.post_response_window_start_time: Start of null period in which the subject awaits a new trial or a timeout period; may receive a noncontingent reward if scheduled.
column_names_to_descriptions.timeout_start_time: Start of extended inter-trial period added due to a false alarm.
column_names_to_descriptions.stim_index: 0-indexed stim number, randomized over trials; refers to `nwb.stimulus.templates` table; nan for catch trials
column_names_to_descriptions.block_index: 0-indexed block number, increments with each block.
column_names_to_descriptions.index: 0-indexed trial number for regular trials (with stimuli), increments over time; nan for catch trials
column_names_to_descriptions.index_within_block: 0-indexed trial number within a block, increments over the block; nan for catch trials
column_names_to_descriptions.scheduled_reward_index_within_block: # TODO check w/Sam; changed from 'noncontingent_reward_index_within_block'; autoreward scheduled, not necessarily given
column_names_to_descriptions.TODO_opto_area_name: Target location for optogenetic inactivation during the trial.
column_names_to_descriptions.TODO_opto_area_index: Target location for optogenetic inactivation during the trial; nan if no opto applied
column_names_to_descriptions.repeat_number: Number of times the trial has already been presented in immediately preceding trials (repeated due to false alarm); nan for catch trials
column_names_to_descriptions.is_response: The subject licked one or more times during the response window.
column_names_to_descriptions.is_correct: The subject acted correctly in the response window, according to its training; includes catch trials
column_names_to_descriptions.is_incorrect: The subject acted incorrectly in the response window, according to its training; includes catch trials
column_names_to_descriptions.is_hit: The subject responded in a GO trial.
column_names_to_descriptions.is_false_alarm: The subject responded in a NOGO trial.
column_names_to_descriptions.is_correct_reject: The subject did not respond in a NOGO trial; excludes catch trials
column_names_to_descriptions.is_miss: The subject did not respond in a GO trial.
column_names_to_descriptions.is_go: Condition in which the subject should respond; target stim presented in rewarded context block
column_names_to_descriptions.is_nogo: Condition in which the subject should not respond; non-target stim presented in any context block; target stim presented in non-rewarded context block; excludes catch trials
column_names_to_descriptions.is_rewarded: The subject received a reward; includes non-contingent rewards
column_names_to_descriptions.is_noncontingent_reward: The subject received a reward that did not depend on its response.
column_names_to_descriptions.is_contingent_reward: The subject received a reward for a correct response in a GO trial.
column_names_to_descriptions.is_reward_scheduled: A non-contingent reward was scheduled to occur; subject may have responded correctly and received contingent reward instead
column_names_to_descriptions.is_aud_stim: An auditory stimulus was presented; target and non-target stimuli; rewarded and unrewarded contexts
column_names_to_descriptions.is_vis_stim: A visual stimulus was presented; target and non-target stimuli; rewarded and unrewarded contexts
column_names_to_descriptions.is_aud_target: An auditory stimulus was presented that the subject should respond to in a certain context.
column_names_to_descriptions.is_vis_target: A visual stimulus was presented that the subject should respond to in a certain context.
column_names_to_descriptions.is_aud_nontarget: An auditory stimulus was presented that the subject should never respond to.
column_names_to_descriptions.is_vis_nontarget: A visual stimulus was presented that the subject should never respond to.
column_names_to_descriptions.is_vis_context: Trial occurs within a block in which the subject should respond to a visual target.
column_names_to_descriptions.is_aud_context: Trial occurs within a block in which the subject should respond to a auditory target.
column_names_to_descriptions.is_repeat: The trial is a repetition of the previous trial, which resulted in a miss; always False on first full trial after context block switch; False for catch trials
column_names_to_descriptions.is_opto: Optogenetic inactivation was applied during the trial.
column_names_to_descriptions.is_context_switch: The first trial with a stimulus after a change in context.

description: auditory/visual routing behavior task trials: divided into sequential `blocks` that switch the reward contingency between `aud_target` and `vis_target`
